import styled from 'styled-components' const FlipCardContainer = styled.div` background-color: red; width: 300px; height: 300px; border: 1px solid #f1f1f1; margin: 10px ` export default function StyDiv(props) { var color = props.id === props.selectedCard ? 'blue' : 'red' var deg = props.id === props.selectedCard ? '180' : '0' var deg2 = props.id === props.selectedCard ? '0' : '180' var front = {width: "300px", height:"300px", webkitBackfaceVisibility: "hidden", backfaceVisibility: "hidden", gridArea: "inner-div", background: 'blue', transition: "transform 2s", transform: `rotateY(${deg}deg)`} var back = {width: "300px", height:"300px", gridArea: "inner-div", webkitBackfaceVisibility: "hidden", backfaceVisibility: "hidden", background: 'red', transition: "transform 2s", transform: `rotateY(${deg2}deg)`} var container = {display: "grid", placeItems: "center", gridTemplateAreas: "inner-div", perspective: "1000px"} return(
text

) }
